评论详情: I ordered 3 times extra large. Love the fit. I am 5.7" about 245. Looks good on me.
It is comfortable and washes well, but I think the colors are too bright.

评论概述: Over sized and Neck line too big!
评论详情: The sizes are quite big and the fact that it takes forever to receive is another issue. I loved the fabric it’s thin and not to heavy. The neck is really big too but found a matching spots bra that could be warn with it. I also took one of my other shirts and laid it on top of it and re-sewed up the sides so it fits better more like the picture advertised. I had to put in some extra work that should not have been but I can now wear it and enjoy it better.
